application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of part single- and part two-storey rear extension at lower and upper ground floor levels; erection of rear dormer roof extension; insertion of rooflights in front roofslope; removal of paint; changes to front garden landscaping
decision_conditions: The proposed rear dormer, by reason of its height, bulk, location and design, would be overly dominant on the rear roofslope to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host building and the Graham Road and Mapledene Conservation Area. As such the proposal is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021, policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan 2020 and the recommendations of the Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Extensions and Alterations 2009.

The proposed rear extensions, by reason of their height, bulk, location and design, would be overly dominant on the rear of the property, and would give rise to an overbearing appearance when viewed from neighbouring properties, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host building and the Graham Road and Mapledene Conservation area and the visual amenity of neighbouring occupiers. As such the proposal is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021, policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP2 (Development and Amenity) and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan 2020 and the recommendations of the Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Extensions and Alterations 2009.

<p>The proposed alterations to the front garden, by reason of inappropriate design, would fail to respect the established pattern of development, to the detriment of the character, appearance and visual amenity of the host building and the area. As such the proposal is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021 and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan 2020.<br></p>
